name: Malefactor (Demo)
description:
Malefactor is a JRPG-style battle game with roguelike customization elements. Gain a new list of powerful abilities every time you play! Fight a variety of enemy encounters, with a new one each time you win or lose!

Controls: ESC brings up the menu, from which you can load a new battle or quit.

All other actions are handled via the mouse.

This a tech demo. For now there is no tutorial.

Please, consider de following:

  • A set of 5 encounters with unique enemies  can be faced each time you load the game or reload the battle.
  • A variety of skills will be randomly chosen for each character at every new battle.
  • Each character has the following resource:
    • Krezzik - warrior type. Generates rage every time he losses health.
    • Ellie - mage type. Some skills generates crystals (fire, ice and lightning) that can be spent to cast other skills. 
    • Jotun - rouge type. Generates energy per time.
